00070 #ifndef UART_H_
00071 #define UART_H_
00072 
00073 #define USCI_A_MODULE  0     // Select which USCI_A module to use [0-1]
00074 #define UART_BAUDRATE  57600 //Specify baudrate
00075 #define UART_BAUDRATE_REG  (unsigned short)(MCLK_FREQ/UART_BAUDRATE)
00076 
00077 //define uart registers
00078 #define UART_PxIN      P3IN
00079 #define UART_PxOUT     P3OUT
00080 #define UART_PxDIR     P3DIR
00081 #define UART_PxIFG     P3IFG
00082 #define UART_PxIES     P3IES
00083 #define UART_PxIE      P3IE
00084 #define UART_PxSEL     P3SEL
00085 #define UART_PxREN     P3REN
00086 
00087 #define UART_RX_PAD    BIT4 // select uart pins P3.4
00088 #define UART_TX_PAD    BIT3 // select uart pins P3.3
00089 
00090 
00091 #include "TI_USCI_UART_Regs.h"
00092 //Global Functions
00093 extern void InitUART(void);
00094 extern void StartUARTRx(void);
00095 extern void StopUARTRx(void);
00096 extern void WriteUART(unsigned char data);
00097 extern void putsUART(unsigned char *buffer, unsigned short StringSize);
00098 
00099 
00100 #endif /*UART_H_*/
